en-GB.name: Team Creator
en-GB.notallowed: Sorry, you do not have permissions to create a team
en-GB.tooExpensive: Your team costs more than the available funds
en-GB.tooFewPlayers: You must have at least 11 players
en-GB.tooManyBlitzers: Too many players of type: Blitzer
en-GB.tooManyRunners: Too many players of type: Runner
en-GB.tooManyThrowers: Too many players of type: Thrower
en-GB.tooManyBlockers: Too many players of type: Blocker
en-GB.tooManySpecial: Too many players of type: Special
en-GB.noInduce: You may not create teams with inducements
en-GB.noTeamName: You must enter a team name
